Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 64th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1970...
Injured on 4/4/1975 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 4/11/1975 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...

Injured on 5/28/1977 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/3/1979 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/1/1983 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Minnesota to Chicago (N) on 6/23/1983 (Going to CHC: P S. Dunning. Going to MIN: SS A. Trammell)...
Released by Chicago (N) on 8/22/1983...
Drafted in 3rd round, 60th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1985...
Injured on 6/8/1989 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/20/1990 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/26/1992, off Danny Jackson (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/15/1992, off Paul Assenmacher (PIT)...
Injured on 8/7/1995 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Chicago (N) on 8/22/1996...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/14/1998 to a 3-year deal worth $830,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Texas on 8/14/1998...
